// use local storage as your db for now
var addToDb=function addToDb(id){var exists=getDb();var shopping_cart={};if(!exists){shopping_cart[id]=1;}else{shopping_cart=JSON.parse(exists);if(shopping_cart[id]){var newCount=shopping_cart[id]+1;shopping_cart[id]=newCount;}else{shopping_cart[id]=1;}}updateDb(shopping_cart);};var getDb=function getDb(){return localStorage.getItem('shopping_cart');};var updateDb=function updateDb(cart){localStorage.setItem('shopping_cart',JSON.stringify(cart));};var removeFromDb=function removeFromDb(id){var exists=getDb();if(!exists){}else{var shopping_cart=JSON.parse(exists);delete shopping_cart[id];updateDb(shopping_cart);}};var getStoredCart=function getStoredCart(){var exists=getDb();return exists?JSON.parse(exists):{};};var clearTheCart=function clearTheCart(){localStorage.removeItem('shopping_cart');};export{addToDb,removeFromDb as deleteFromDb,clearTheCart,getStoredCart};
